PauseTipText: Hidden rings and items can be uprooted from signposts at the end of the level depending on where it lands.
Be sure to explore the levels. You never know what secrets you'll find!
Rolling on slopes will increase your momentum.
Did you know that the bosses in this game mostly work through a weak spot system? Look out for their weaknesses to do some damage!
Seek out the Big Rings hidden in stages to enter Special Stages!
Be sure to take a break if you're feeling tired.
If you roll while running on a water surface, you'll start skipping like a stone!
Shield abilities have passive abilities that can affect the environment you're in.

Sonic: Sonic can perform a Drop Dash when you hold the jump %s in air.
Sonic can perform a wall dash if you start a Drop Dash next to walls! He can also jump off of the walls he scales to do a cool flip jump off it.
As Sonic, the shield abilities can be used with your secondary jump %s. If you prefer it inverted, you can change this in the options menu.
Tails: Tails is able to cancel his flight if you hold the down %s and press jump at the same time.
Knuckles: Knuckles carries momentum when he glides. He can also jump out of a slide after landing from a glide to keep momentum going, and he can roll after sliding if he reaches a steep slope incline.

As Knuckles, if you hold the down %s after dropping from a glide, he can go straight into the crouch state, meaning you can quickly charge a Spin Dash in mere seconds after landing! If this is done over steep slopes, Knuckles will instantly roll.
Fang: Fang can charge his gun to launch himself high into the air. The longer you hold the jump %s for, the more he charges! The bullet he fires from this can hurt badniks and affect objects it touches.
Tunnel: Tunnel can dive into the ground and launch out in different directions. He can use this launch to get into walls and ceilings.
Tunnel's dive can break certain blocks around or under him to access secret paths.
